data.name: CurrentPositionText
data.value: With 3+ years of experience as a Software Engineer, I have worked in Full Stack Developer positions. I have strong technical knowledge in .NET Core, Angular, React, SQL Server, and Web APIs. I have optimized business processes and increased efficiency by developing in-house custom software. I am seeking opportunities to add value in a new position using my knowledge and experience.

data.name: AboutMeText1
data.value: I worked as a Full Stack Developer at Efece Galvaniz.

data.name: AboutMeText2
data.value: Here, I developed a custom software called Nova that integrated with the Netsis program.

data.name: AboutMeText3
data.value: Through this program, employees were able to track inventory, customer information, and monitor live production using a barcode system.

data.name: AboutMeText4
data.value: We used Microsoft SQL Server as the database backend for our application.

data.name: AboutMeText5
data.value: I developed a Web Service (API) to facilitate data communication between SQL Server and our application.

data.name: AboutMeText6
data.value: Each user had their own account and authorization roles. They could access modules specific to their positions based on these permissions.

data.name: AboutMeText7
data.value: My goal was to improve company performance and increase profits by implementing modern innovations throughout the organization through the application.

data.name: SkillsText1
data.value: • Developing modern web applications using .NET Core MVC, Web API, and Entity Framework Core

data.name: SkillsText2
data.value: • Advanced experience in Microsoft SQL Server, T-SQL, Stored Procedures, and Functions

data.name: SkillsText3
data.value: • User interface development with modern frontend technologies like Angular and React

data.name: SkillsText4
data.value: • Creating dynamic web applications with jQuery and JavaScript

data.name: SkillsText5
data.value: • Writing sustainable code by applying SOLID principles and design patterns

data.name: SkillsText6
data.value: • Project management and teamwork with Agile/Scrum methodologies

data.name: SkillsText7
data.value: • Strong communication skills and problem-solving ability

data.name: EfeceGalvanizDescription
data.value: As a Full Stack Developer, I developed a custom software integrated with Netsis.

data.name: CSistemDescription
data.value: I facilitated communication and coordination between municipal staff and our software team regarding municipal software solutions.

data.name: EtiyaDescription
data.value: I provided infrastructure support through SQL queries in our Türk Telekom project.

data.name: FormatConverterDescription
data.value: A user-friendly tool to convert your PDF files to Word format.

data.name: FormatConverterFeedback
data.value: This project is continuously evolving, and I am working to ensure the most accurate conversion of PDF files to Word format. Your feedback about any issues encountered during the conversion process through the contact section would be invaluable for the project's development.

data.name: PersonnelTrackingSystem
data.value: I took a leading role in the development and implementation of the personnel tracking system within the company. We modernized the entry-exit tracking with a QR code system specially designed for each employee. By automating personnel time tracking through tablet-based readers, I enabled the Human Resources department to manage timesheet data more efficiently and accurately. Through this system, I minimized errors from manual data entry while enabling secure and transparent digital tracking of personnel attendance.

data.name: WebHelpDescription
data.value: I served as a software support specialist in the LEIA project. In this project, we provided technical support to iPhone customers and coordinated with the software team in Ireland to resolve issues when needed. By focusing on customer satisfaction, I ensured that technical problems were resolved quickly and effectively.

data.name: ReferenceProjectsDescription
data.value: My actively developed projects that you can experience in a live environment. These works include professional applications developed using modern technologies and best software practices.

data.name: TryConverter
data.value: Try our free PDF to Word converter
